data.actual_result: The PiP box is partially covered by the notch
data.expected_result: The PiP box should float to the right of the notch area so the feed is fully visible
data.short_description: iPhone X notch partially covers the video call PiP box in landscape mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a video call with another user (not a group call) - Rotate to landscape (anticlockwise) - Observe the PiP (picture-in-picture) box in the upper left corner
